WorkItem.ClosedComment: 4.1.05 Released. If this is still an issue, please reopen with exact steps to reproduce and any necessary character files
WorkItem.Description:
The mastery tooltip pane shows the benefit from mastery being 44.8% + your mastery * 5.6%. The value of 44.8%/5.6% = 8 masterypoints given by Unshackled fury.
Patch 4.1 changed Unshackled Fury, it now grants 2 base points of mastery, down from 8. 
Â 
Also white damage should be increased with 40% by Precision.

Comments.Message:
The back end for mastery was updated, this is just a display issue.

White damage I believe was set up to be boosted but I will need to double-check.

Please check Raging blow in Skills.Fury.cs as well:
DamageBonus *= 1f + (8f*0.056f + 0.0560f * StatConversion.GetMasteryFromRating(DPSWarrChar.StatS.MasteryRating, CharacterClass.Warrior));
